attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LeDdqBbIYAuEQuLk6uS_description
attribs.current: The first mate makes two attacks with its longsword.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LeDdqBbIYAuEQuLk6uT_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LeDdqBbIYAuEQuLk6uU_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdqBbIYAuEQuLk6uV_desc
attribs.current: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdqBbIYAuEQuLk6uV_description
attribs.current: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.
